title: 求一个删除长时间不登录玩家的领地插件
author: 华伦
txt_content: 游戏版本1.12.2   领地插件用的是Residence  希望有一个自动清除长时间不上线玩家领地的插件     或者有没有长时间不上线就清理用户数据的插件

replies.author: qse
replies.txt_content:
Residence自带此功能
  AutoCleanUp:
    # HIGHLY EXPERIMENTAL residence cleaning on server startup if player is offline for x days.
    # Players can bypass this with residence.cleanbypass permission node
    Use: true
    # For how long player should be offline to delete hes residence
    Days: 60
    # Do you want to regenerate old residence area
    # This requires world edit to be present
    #删除领地后是否使用Worldedit重新生成地形
    Regenerate: false
    # Worlds to be included in check list
    Worlds:
    - 你想启用的世界复制代码

replies.author: 中华博
replies.txt_content: 我记得领地插件自带多久不上线自动删领地功能

replies.author: 华伦
replies.txt_content:
qse 发表于 2019-7-11 20:52
Residence自带此功能
Residence能不能设置不圈地无法破坏方块  圈地只用圈xz轴  高度直接默认最大

replies.author: 酷哩葩
replies.txt_content: 只是删除领地数据吗？不会是全部都要删除吧，恐怕有点难哦。。。

replies.author: qse
replies.txt_content:
华伦 发表于 2019-7-11 23:00
Residence能不能设置不圈地无法破坏方块  圈地只用圈xz轴  高度直接默认最大 ...
config里的bypass-Y设为true

replies.author: 华伦
replies.txt_content:
qse 发表于 2019-7-12 10:29
config里的bypass-Y设为true
没找到那个

replies.author: qse
replies.txt_content:
Selection:
    # By setting this to true, all selections will be made from bedrock to sky ignoring Y coordinates
    #自动圈Y=0到Y=256
    IgnoreY: true
    # When this set to true, selections inside existing residence will be from bottom to top of that residence
    # When this set to false, selections inside existing residence will be exactly as they are
    IgnoreYInSubzone: false
    # By setting this to true, player will only pay for x*z blocks ignoring height
    # This will lower residence price by up to 256 times, so adjust block price BEFORE enabling this
    # Y轴圈地免费（仅按照XZ计算价格）
    NoCostForYBlocks: true复制代码
